results.title: Heathers
results.creator_credit: Denise Di Novi, New World Pictures, Cinemarque Entertainment and Michael Lehmann
results.brief_description: This black comedy about high school politics, teenage suicide and trendy cliques, focuses on the ‘Heathers’, three of the prettiest and most popular rich girls at Westerbury High School, home of preppies, nerds and trendies. They set the trends, make the rules and devise ways of making life hell for the other students. That is until Heather No.4 who is really a Veronica, (Winona Ryder), teams up with her boyfriend, JD, a rebellious new student (Christian Slater), to change all the rules and seek revenge. An ultimate revenge fantasy which has become a “cult” movie. Also stars Shannen Doherty.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Denise Di Novi, New World Pictures, Cinemarque Entertainment and Michael Lehmann

results.title: Heather Locklear chocolate
results.brief_description: Award-winning comedy about a gender-bending teenager (Einar Johansen) and his passion for nail polish. Each of his favorites has a story behind it, however his ‘holy grail’ of nail polishes is a colour worn by Heather Locklear in ‘Melrose Place’.
results.description: Award-winning comedy about a gender-bending teenager (Einar Johansen) and his passion for nail polish. Each of his favorites has a story behind it, however his ‘holy grail’ of nail polishes is a colour worn by Heather Locklear in ‘Melrose Place’.

results.title: Heather's case (Captioned)
results.brief_description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Improving Performance”.
The youngest clerical worker in a project team is angry about staff who are inconsiderate, messy and who avoid her whilst her colleagues have complained to the new supervisor about her being aggressive. The supervisor attempts to resolve the problem and then Peter Quarry assumes the role of supervisor and uses the 3 step approach.

results.title: Heat treatment of aluminum. Part 2
results.brief_description: Explains the nature of cold working operations; crystalline structure of aluminum alloys; slip planes and deformation; microstructure changes during cold working; microstructure changes during annealing; cold working operations; and annealing operations.
results.description: Explains the nature of cold working operations; crystalline structure of aluminum alloys; slip planes and deformation; microstructure changes during cold working; microstructure changes during annealing; cold working operations; and annealing operations.

results.title: Heat treatment of aluminum. Part 1
results.brief_description: Explains the purpose of heat treatment; micro-structure changes during heat treatment; heat treatment procedure; precipitation hardening; and the effects of heat treatment on the physical properties of aluminum.

results.title: Heat treatment
results.creator_credit: Frank A. Hoare, Robin Cantelon and British Iron and Steel Federation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Structure and Properties of Steel”.
Shows the different forms of heat treatment and how they govern the final properties of steel.

results.title: Heat rays
results.brief_description: Instructional film analysing the relationship between heat and light radiation; the sun as a source of light and heat, making a photograph with light and heat rays; applications and uses of heat rays; reflection, refraction and movement of heat rays; applications of these properties of heat rays to everyday life; relationships between heat and light as a form of vibration of electro-magnetic waves of different frequencies; the role of heat rays in maintaining life on this planet.
results.description: Instructional film analysing the relationship between heat and light radiation; the sun as a source of light and heat, making a photograph with light and heat rays; applications and uses of heat rays; reflection, refraction and movement of heat rays; applications of these properties of heat rays to everyday life; relationships between heat and light as a form of vibration of electro-magnetic waves of different frequencies; the role of heat rays in maintaining life on this planet.

results.title: Heat causes expansion
results.creator_credit: Gateway Film Productions and W. Hugh Baddeley
results.brief_description: Shows two children carrying out experiments in their home to prove that solids, liquids and gases expand when heated. Also shows many ways in which this law of physics occurs in everyday life. Suitable for upper secondary level.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gateway Film Productions and W. Hugh Baddeley

results.title: Heat and dust
results.creator_credit: Ismail Merchant, Merchant Ivory Productions and James Ivory
results.brief_description: A young English woman journeys to India to explore the mysterious and scandalous past of her Great-aunt sixty years ago. Both succumb to the beauty of the land and its people and become pregnant. Nevertheless, they remain outsiders in a land they can never fully comprehend. Stars Julie Christie, Greta Scacchi and Madhur Jaffrey.
